text:
Wavebreak Media is just producing footages
and high resolution images.

We are in total around 90 people.
The IT team's around 15 people.

We produce tens of thousands of 4K videos
and high-resolution images. So storage was always a problem.

We wanted to make sure that the
production workflow is just streamlined.

How we use AWS to solve this challenge, actually,
we just shipped all our products, all our assets to S3.

Our applications needed to run without any break,
without any problems, simply.
Before we started the project, our time to market was 67 days.
That was just limiting us about the reacting to the trend changes.
We just shortened this duration until seven days.

Looking forward, we just want to more
invest in the AI technologies.
The AI services in AWS are amazing.
For the other companies who are working with AWS, one thing that I can tell you really just get the business support.
You may just hit some walls that you cannot solve yourself very easily. So AWS Support is really great for that.

Why AWS? One word: it is reliable.
Whenever you need support, they are there.
You can just like that, the infrastructure is just there supporting you. When you want to scale up, it is there.
